title: Which QB should the Jets draft, are the Patriots heading towards an ending?
description:
Dan Hanzus of NFL Media's Around the NFL Podcast joins Will Brinson to talk about what the Jets should do in the draft this year and specifically break down which QB of the "big four" is the best fit in the Big Apple. They also break down the Jets offseason, debate whether or not the Patriots could be in trouble with their offseason thus far and then have some discuss which song Dan would use for his walk up music if he was on the PGA Tour plus which other random stuff.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
